word: We hear a great deal about faith, but we need to hear a great deal more about works. Many are deceiving their own souls by living an easy-going, accommodating, crossless religion. But Jesus says, "If any man will come after Me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow Me." [THE SIGNS OF THE TIMES, JUNE 16, 1890. (MORNING TALK AT BASEL, SWITZERLAND, SEPT. 17, 1885.)]
